alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Georgetown, southeastern Horry and central Williamsburg Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rhems to near Trio. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... DeBordieu Colony, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Andrews, Rhems, Trio, Warsaw, Burgess, Oatland, Nesmith, Plantersville, Yauhannah, Earle, Morrisville, Litchfield Beach and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg
